attributes.action: Scrap the taxation rule whereby pensioners over 65 have for every two pounds that they earn over the personal allowance threshold of £20900 [2007/8 rate] thaty have £1 decducted from their age related allowance [curtently £7550 2007/8 rate]..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pensioners aged over 65-75, who earn more than the age related threshold of £20900 are penalised by having £1 deducted from the age related non-taxable allowance of £7550 for every £2 that they earn over the threshold.  This extra stealth tax inhibits pensioners spending power, and the amounts deducted would go a long way to helping Senior Citizens with fuel bills.
